scenario.data.rise_of_the_ancients.name: Rise of the Ancients
scenario.data.rise_of_the_ancients.descr: Dragons and other Ancient Creatures have risen and are now <style="status">rampaging</style> through the lands. You pledged to bring those Ancient Creatues back to where they came from.
scenario.data.rise_of_the_ancients.win.0: All the <style="value">Roaming Ancients</style> must be <style="status">Defeated</style> before the end of the last Round.
